amendment.description: To designate the San Pedro aquifers as priority transboundary aquifers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1585 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1585 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Bingaman. To designate the San Pedro aquifers as priority transboundary aquifers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1585 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1585 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Bingaman.
